thread.section_title: Solar Quotes Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Solar Quotes | solarquotes.com.au
thread.title: Barrie Restall
thread.title_full: Solar Quotes reviewed by Barrie Restall

author: Barrie Restall
title: Barrie Restall
text:
We received three referrals all of whom contacted us within a few days. All were very professional and competitive and we eventually chose SAE who installed a 6.5kWh system with a Fronius inverter. We have just had the first maintenance check with no major problems and we are very happy with the installation, service and performance of the system. SAE are pursuing a minor issue with Essential Energy concerning the supply to our unit, on our behalf. We continue to use the Solar Quote: s website for information on solar developments including battery technology as we will consider batteries in the future.
A very good source of information, thank you Finn.
